item.title: About
item.description: Hello world, I’m Olivier. I’m a freelance product owner & project manager whose experience lies in leading technical teams and providing technical guidance. I’m at my best translating business needs into technological solutions with and for a team. A great user experience, security and maintainable code are important for me and contribute to both the end-user and developers’ happiness. I am ambitious and driven with a never-ending curiosity which always keeps me learning.
